extendedInfo.description: Want a party in your pocket? Elfster simplifies gift giving, and makes your gift shopping and wishing more fun and social. While on the go, you can easily see your friendsâ wishlists, ask them secret questions, check out the hottest trending gifts, or check in on your âsecret santaâ style gift exchange with friends, family and colleagues scattered far and wide. Anytime. Anyplace. And bar code scanning lets you add wishes to your own list anytime you run across something cool while out and about. Join millions of happy gift givers and party lovers using Elfster, the leading free, online gift exchange organizer and wishlist site.Simplify birthdays and holidays and every gifting occasion with the official Elfster app for Android.Features: Add anything from anywhere to your wishlist. Find and follow friends wishlists (and they can follow yours). Participate in a âsecret santaâ style gift exchange. See who your âsecret santa draw is. Check out trending gifts and get inspired. Like gifts on Facebook. Tweet cool gifts. Send secret questions to your friends.

reviews.title: Lots of potential, but a no go
reviews.comment: I\'m attempting to use it on an HTC One S and the screen keep going white when I try to scroll down. I really wished it worked so that I could recommend it to the rest of the people doing the draw. I\'m uninstalling it, but hope it gets fixed soon so that I may reinstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: It worked fine before but now when I try to log in, it kicks me out in the middle of me typing.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Giselle Reyes

reviews.title: App Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: I get the elf with the pink screen but can\'t even log on. Waste of time installing it. I had the app before and while it want a miracle in my pocket, it actually worked.
reviews.author: Jennifer Gee

reviews.title: Poor effort
reviews.comment: Can usually login although the functions are very limited.  The scans wish will never lock on the the barcode. Constant resolution issues. It does let you see the lists and some recent post so it isn\'t completely useless. Definitely below average for an application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: Its really sad because it would be nice to have. I uninstalled it for the same annoying reasons everyone else stated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sucks - nothing works
reviews.comment: only get home page, and then anything you click on, get white blank screen. can get to full site though from settings button. other than that absolutely useless app. very disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kind of works but disappointing
reviews.comment: It\'s not much better than just going to the mobile site with your browser. You would\'ve thought there would be an update in time for the holiday season.
reviews.author: Patrick Fulgado

reviews.title: Not good enough
reviews.comment: The barcode scanner is on the bottom right for some reason but the camera focuses differently. I have yet to get it to work. It runs a background process that doesn\'t shut off ebbed after a force close, which keeps my screen on (prevents dimming, lock, etc). The site is great, but this app is just not up to par.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Screen-to-screen transitions are laggy and jagged looking. Barcode scanning hasn\'t successfully pulled any item up. Display resolution is not consistent across the application. Considering a dual-core Galaxy Nexus runs this app similarly to single core devices of past years, this is a terrible port to Android. Performance is similar across all modern versions of Android still in use (2.3, 3.0, 4.0+)
reviews.author: Francis Castrillo

reviews.title: White screen fixed
reviews.comment: After we emialed elfster and told them the problem they said they really wanted to fix it and they said it\'s not working on their androids either. And today it is fixed! Thanks Elfster
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: This app would be great if it worked. Super patchy, very frustrating to use. Better off just waiting and using the computer. Not just my phone either, I have tried thus app on three phones now. Hopefully they will finish developing it.
reviews.author: Ernesto Segura

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: I usually don\'t take the time to rate things, but this is my exception. App always force closes when I try to login; via regular login, Facebook or the full site option. Starting up the app is slow and sluggish too. Definitely not up to par with even the simplest app. Don\'t bother with this app. Took me all of 10minutes to uninstall it. It\'s like no one at elfster has an android phone at all.
reviews.author: Lissan Loi

reviews.title: Not as good as website
reviews.comment: It\'s not as functional as the website. It\'s not as useful. Can just log into computer instead.
reviews.author: Lisa G

reviews.title: Blank screen
reviews.comment: Keeps just going blank! Will.have to use the web instead
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has Potential, please update it!
reviews.comment: The screen keeps going blank. Many functions don\'t work. If you fix it, I\'ll adjust my rating! ;)
reviews.author: Lindsay Ropiak

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: App wont let me log in... keeps telling me that my correct password and username are incorrect... needs to be fixed
reviews.author: Emily Mummolo

reviews.title: Simply doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The layout is really awkward.  The app should put you right on the main page where you can see the updates or at least make it simpler to get to.  I can\'t get the barcode scanner to even come up and although it seems like the camera takes a photo, it didn\'t actually post it to my wishlist
reviews.author: Chrissy Tertzakian

reviews.title: a waste...useless app
reviews.comment: shuts down as i try to enter password....i give it one star for potential and for allowing me to uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating!!!!
reviews.comment: I can\'t login at all it goes to a blank white screen!! This app sucks!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poorly coded
reviews.comment: This is no app. It\'s browser giving you there mobile website and the barcode scanner doesn\'t work on Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Samuel Pelletier
